attributes.action: Stop supporting Benefit CHEATS and get them back to work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to stop benefit cheats from claiming when there is nothing wrong with them.  To stop them enjoying all day in the bookmakers on our tax money and having a stress free life, whilst us, the tax payers, keep going to work and have our tax money spent on keeping these idle buggers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
